title: Person Of Interest Soundtrack: 4x20 Terra Incognita (Compilation)
author: FringeMusic107
comment:
This episode moved me to tears 😢 
They were close by mutual respect & common Military backgrounds.  She changed him with her moral Compass & it's fitting that when he's dying.....he'd cling to her memory for guidance & support to get him through.  I loved it immensely

I love the show and the music is for something in it. So I love your work of it. Thank you a lot! And I agreed 6:16 is awesome.
There is also the endind of episode 4x18 with Finch & Root who was thrilling, if you have time for this piece meanwhile the season finale, thanks!
can never thank you enough for this compilation! I love this episode so much! heck I love reese to pieces!!

Could you please upload some of the tracks used throughout the seasons when a member of the team is investigating an area (Usually breaking into an apartment) as the one of those tracks officially released was "Descent into deviant behavior"
I came for 9:33 . Coz it is the best part of the soundtrack
description: Compilation of soundtracks from Person Of Interest episodd 4x20 "Terra Incognita". Features Carter's, Reese's and Jessica's themes. Oh, and check out 6:16. Composed by Ramin Djawadi.
